tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.subtitle: Explore the technologies and tools I use
tech.selectTopic: Please select a topic from the left
tech.reactHooksDescription: These examples demonstrate the basic usage and common application scenarios of React Hooks. Each example includes functionality description, code implementation, and live demonstration.

rotatingCube.title: Rotating Cube
rotatingCube.description: A basic Three.js example showing how to create a 3D cube with lighting effects and smooth rotation animation. This is the first step in learning Three.js.
rotatingCube.modalDescription: This is a basic Three.js example demonstrating how to create scenes, cameras, renderers, geometry, and lighting.

particleSystem.title: Particle System
particleSystem.description: Create a dynamic particle system with thousands of moving and interacting particles. Demonstrates performance optimization techniques in Three.js when handling large numbers of objects.
particleSystem.modalDescription: This example creates a dynamic system containing 5000 particles.

airpods.title: Airpods Scroll Animation
airpods.description: Frame-by-frame animation effect implemented with GSAP ScrollTrigger, showcasing Airpods details and features. Creates smooth visual experience through scroll-triggered animation.
airpods.modalDescription: This example demonstrates how to create scroll-based frame-by-frame animations using GSAP's ScrollTrigger plugin.

timeline.title: Timeline Animation Sequence
timeline.description: Create complex animation sequences using GSAP Timeline, demonstrating coordinated animation effects of multiple elements. Achieve precise animation choreography through timeline control.
timeline.modalDescription: This example demonstrates how to create complex animation sequences using GSAP Timeline.

scroll.title: Scroll Trigger Animation
scroll.description: Create scroll-triggered animation effects using ScrollTrigger, adding dynamic visual elements to pages. Trigger different animation states based on scroll position.
scroll.modalDescription: This example demonstrates how to create scroll-triggered animation effects using GSAP's ScrollTrigger plugin.

react.name: React
react.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

css.name: CSS
css.description: Cascading Style Sheets for designing web styles

threejs.name: Three.js
threejs.description: JavaScript 3D library for creating and displaying 3D graphics

search.hint: Enter keywords to search blog posts

counter.title: useState Counter
counter.description: This example demonstrates the basic usage of React's useState Hook. Click the buttons to increase or decrease the counter value.
counter.key1: Use useState Hook to manage component state

inputEffect.title: useEffect Input
inputEffect.description: This example demonstrates the use of useEffect Hook. When the input content changes, it automatically calculates and updates the character count.
inputEffect.key1: useEffect is used to handle side effects
inputEffect.key2: Dependency array [input] ensures execution only on input changes

timer.title: useRef Timer
timer.description: This example demonstrates the use of useRef Hook. Save timer reference through useRef and clean up the timer when component unmounts.
timer.key1: useRef is used to save mutable values
timer.key2: useEffect cleanup function prevents memory leaks
timer.key3: Automatically clean up timer on component unmount

todoList.title: Todo List
todoList.description: This example demonstrates comprehensive state management in React. Implements add and delete functionality for todo items, with support for quick add via Enter key.
todoList.key1: Use array state to manage todo list

themeButton.title: useContext Theme Toggle
themeButton.description: This example demonstrates how to use useContext Hook and Context API to implement global theme switching. Context allows state sharing in the component tree without prop drilling.
themeButton.sampleContent: This is a sample content area
themeButton.key2: Use Provider component to provide values
themeButton.key3: Use useContext Hook to consume context values
themeButton.key4: Share state between components through Context

shoppingCart.title: useReducer Shopping Cart
shoppingCart.description: This example demonstrates how to use useReducer Hook to manage complex shopping cart state. Through reducer function, we can centralize all state update logic, making code clearer and more maintainable.
shoppingCart.key1: Use useReducer to manage complex state
shoppingCart.key2: Centralize state update logic through reducer function
shoppingCart.key3: Use TypeScript type definitions to ensure type safety
shoppingCart.key4: Implement add, remove, update quantity functionality
